page.title: 17 A Day In The Life.
page.content: My name is James.I am nine years old.I live in the village of Barham.I have two older brothers.On a typical Saturday I get up,get dressed,have a wash,have breakfast,and me and Mum go shopping in the supermarket in Canterbury.We go in the car.I like going shopping because we go in the cafe.I have a doughnut and a coke.When we are finished I sit on the supermarket trolley and my Mum pushes me around the shop.When we come back we unpack the shopping.I go to play on my bike.Sometimes I watch the video.I like Omega Man and Superman II.Sometimes I play with my friend Timothy.We play all day.We climb trees and ride our bikes.When it is time to come in I watch T.V.I have a bath and go to bed at about nine o' clock.
